meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Arthur Mitchell Tom Moses Adelaide Jaffe Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1483.

td.p: Arthur Mitchell, an advertising writer from Grosse Pointe, Michigan
Tom Moses, a lawyer from Long Beach, California
Adelaide Jaffe, a computer operator from Bay Village, Ohio

tr.td: ACCORDING TO PEOPLE
POETRY
WEATHER
COOKING CLASS
EASY MATH
BIBLE LOCALES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Dustin Hoffman kept the dresses he wore in this film; his favorite one is brown silk')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Dustin Hoffman kept the dresses he wore in this film; his favorite one is brown silk

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_5', 'clue_J_5_5_stuck', '(Adelaide: What is the multiplicant?)
[Time\'s up signals]
(Adelaide: Oh!)
(Alex: Adelaide wishes she had said what?)
(Adelaide: The dividend.)
(Alex: [After giving correct response] So, you\'d have been wrong twice; aren\'t you glad you can only ring in once?)
[Laughter]

quotient

Adelaide
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:

(Adelaide: No, that\'s a different musical.)
(Alex: It is? Thank you very much.)
[Laughter & applause for Adelaide\'s correct response]

Oklahoma!

Adelaide
')
